item.title: Simulating Star Cluster Formation
item.description: This is a movie my simulations of star cluster formation from a molecular cloud. The left and right panel shows the density and temperature and the cyan dots represent stars. Related publication: C.-C. He, M. Ricotti & S. Geen (2019, in preparation). “Simulating Star Clusters Across Cosmic Time: I. Initial Mass Function, Star Formation Rates and Efficiencies”
